Social And Cultural Activities: Rendering service to the poor and economically weaker communities and taking part in the events promoting communal harmony; active in social service fraternity
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Walking, listening to light music, meditation and reading
Special Interests: Reading the works of eminent leaders and sociologists
Educational Qualifications: Under Graduate Educated at Gulbarga Medical College, Gulbarga, Karnataka
Other Information: Elected Member, General Council of the Indian School of Mines, Dhanbad, 1990 onwards
